ai.behavior:
!when self has effect -Pact with the Wicked One- use -Pact with the Wicked One-
!when self has effect -Arcane Mastery- use -Arcane Mastery-
when 1 nearby enemy use -Hell Fire Tempest- on mightiest enemy
!when nearby enemy use Move to mightiest
when adjacent enemy use -Claw- on weakest enemy
!when nearby enemy use -Spark- on weakest enemy
